<a href="https://get.justworks.com/morningbrew?utm_source=morningbrew&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=fy20_q3_morningbrew_newsletter" style="border-bottom:none!important;" target="_blank" class=""><img alt="Justworks" style="width:100%;max-width: 180px; display: inline; vertical-align: middle;" width="180" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiIxNTc5MTMxNjAxLmpwZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im1vcm5pbmdicmV3LW9zbG8iLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ=="></a>
</th>

</table>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-top:20px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Good morning. </strong>Before we get to Kobe—today is the 75th anniversary of the liberation of the Auschwitz-Birkenau death camp, where nearly 1 million Jews were murdered by the Nazis. World leaders gathered in Jerusalem last week to mark the occasion, and yesterday Pope Francis offered a message we’d like to echo:</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>"In the face of this huge tragedy, this atrocity, indifference is not admissible and memory is a duty.”</span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>“We are all invited to take a moment for prayer and for reflection, each one saying in one’s own heart: Never again, never again!”</span></li>
</ul>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
</th>
</tr>
</table>

<div class="c6 " style="margin-bottom:7px">
<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
SPORTS
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/01/26/kobe-bryant-19782020?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Kobe Bryant: Athlete, Investor, Entrepreneur, Inspiration
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="Kobe Bryant " style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiIxNTgwMDc2MDUzLmpwZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im1vcm5pbmdicmV3LW9zbG8iLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Rob Carr/Getty Images</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Basketball icon Kobe Bryant, 41, was <a href="https://www.espn.com/nba/story/_/id/28569438/kobe-bryant-dead-helicopter-crash?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">killed</a> in a helicopter crash in Calabasas, CA, yesterday. His daughter Gianna also died, along with seven others.</p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">For Kobe, business was basketball and basketball was business</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">When he went pro straight out of high school in 1996, Kobe became the youngest player in NBA history. By the time he closed out his career 20 years later, Black Mamba had won five NBA titles, two Olympic gold medals, and an MVP award. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Kobe carried that determination over to the business world, where he was a tenacious investor and entrepreneur.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>ESPN anchor Rece Davis </span><span><a href="https://twitter.com/ReceDavis/status/1221528592347271176?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">said</a></span><span> Kobe told him he didn’t miss playing because he attacked his business ventures with the “same ferocity with which he attacked basketball.” </span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>In a 2017 podcast episode, investor Chris Sacca said he was skeptical about Kobe’s business instincts. A few months after their initial meeting, Sacca </span><span><a href="https://www.businessinsider.com/chris-sacca-kobe-bryant-investing-2017-7?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">became</a></span><span> “enthralled by him because this is a very unique personality type that I only kind of see in some of our very best entrepreneurs.”</span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Take his work with sports drink startup BodyArmour. In March 2014, Kobe bought roughly 10% of the company for $6 million. When Coca-Cola acquired a minority stake in BodyArmour in August 2018, Kobe’s investment was reportedly <a href="https://www.espn.com/nba/story/_/id/24384862/kobe-bryant-6m-investment-sports-drink-now-worth-200m?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">valued at $200 million</a>. Not one to just write a check and watch from the sidelines, Kobe <a href="https://ftw.usatoday.com/2018/04/kobe-bryant-bodyarmor-kristaps-harden-mike-trout?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">wrote and co-directed</a> four of the brand’s ads. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">What was Kobe working on recently? </strong>Bryant Stibel, a $100 million venture capital fund he quietly founded with entrepreneur Jeff Stibel in 2013. <a href="https://www.bryantstibel.com/about/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Bryant Stibel</a> has invested in dozens of companies, including LegalZoom and <em>Fortnite </em>creator Epic Games.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Bottom line: </strong>“It's a hard thing for athletes to start over. You have to begin again,” Kobe said two years ago. He made it look easy.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">+ <a href="https://www.foxsports.com/nba/story/kobe-bryant-death-reaction-news-breaking-helicopter-crash-012620?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">How the world reacted</a> to Kobe’s tragic death.</p>

<div class="c6 " style="margin-bottom:7px">
<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
PUBLIC HEALTH
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/01/26/china-world-everything-not-fine-coronavirus?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
China to World: Everything Is Not Fine
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Prepare to get sent home immediately if you arrive at work coughing this week. As of last night, the coronavirus outbreak had killed around 80 people and infected more than 2,100 others, including five in the U.S. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">The diagnosis: </strong>China's top health minister <a href="https://www.nbcnews.com/news/world/deadly-coronavirus-likely-spread-china-warns-u-s-prepares-evacuate-n1123211?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">said</a> the virus is spreading more quickly than expected. The government has locked down 56 million citizens and extended the Lunar New Year holiday. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">But some experts <a href="https://www.nytimes.com/2020/01/25/world/asia/coronavirus-crisis-china-response.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">argue</a> earlier failures could have contributed to the virus's intensity, including:</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>A bureaucracy that discourages local officials from reporting problems early</span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Decentralized regulations that failed to supervise livestock markets like the one where the virus is believed to have originated (yesterday, Beijing </span><span><a href="https://www.washingtonpost.com/world/asia_pacific/china-bans-wild-animal-trade-until-coronavirus-epidemic-eliminated/2020/01/26/0e05a964-4017-11ea-971f-4ce4f94494b4_story.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">temporarily banned</a></span><span> the trade of wild animals)</span>
</li>
</ul>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">The damage</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The Dow, S&P, and Nasdaq <a href="https://www.cnn.com/2020/01/24/investing/dow-stock-market-today/index.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">closed</a> Friday with some of their heaviest one-day losses in months. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Lunar New Year travel was <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2020/01/26/how-coronavirus-is-beginning-to-hit-chinas-economy.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">down almost 29%</a> annually on Saturday. American and United shares <a href="https://www.cbsnews.com/news/stock-market-down-on-coronavirus-fears-spread-to-u-s/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">fell</a> ~5% Friday, while Discover and Synchrony slumped about 10% each over fears of reduced travel spending. Starbucks, Disney, and McDonald's are <a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/shanghai-disneyland-to-temporarily-shut-amid-virus-outbreak-11579879285?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">closing</a> some locations in China.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Looking ahead...</strong>U.S. public health officials say there's no reason for panic. But you can stay up-to-date with <a href="https://gisanddata.maps.arcgis.com/apps/opsdashboard/index.html?utm_source=morning_brew#/bda7594740fd40299423467b48e9ecf6?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">this dashboard</a> by the Johns Hopkins CSSE research collective.</p>

<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
AVIATION
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/01/26/boeing-starts-testing-new-jumbo-jet-777x?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Boeing Episode IV: A New Hope
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="A Boeing 777X airplane takes off on its inaugural flight at Paine Field in Everett, Washington on January 25, 2020." style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiIxNTgwMDU2NjI1LmpwZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im1vcm5pbmdicmV3LW9zbG8iLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>JASON REDMOND/AFP via Getty Images</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Ain't she a beaut? Boeing's newest plane model, the 777X, <a href="https://www.reuters.com/article/us-boeing-777x/boeings-777x-jetliner-successfully-completes-maiden-flight-idUSKBN1ZO0QA?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">successfully completed</a> its maiden voyage on Saturday. It lifted off at 10:09am PT, hung out in the air long enough for pilots to qualify for pretzels (about four hours), and touched down to a big sigh of relief from Boeing execs. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Zoom out: </strong>Boeing is hoping the 777X (or 777-9, officially) will help it move past the ongoing crisis around the 737 Max, the company's bestselling model that's been grounded for almost a year. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>If Boeing </span><span><em>really</em></span><span> wanted to make the 737 Max go away, it could just stick the plane in one of the 777X's massive General Electric engines, which can swallow a 737 Max fuselage whole.</span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>One other quirk of the 777X is its folding wingtips that allow it to fit into the same parking bays as its predecessors. </span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Looking ahead...</strong>the 777X is expected to enter service in 2021. But concerns linger over its <a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2020-01-24/boeing-777x-first-flight?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">enormous size</a> (will the economics work out?) and the FAA certification process.</p>

<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-top: 12px;">
<a href="https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.morningbrew.com%2Fdaily%2Fstories%2F2020%2F01%2F26%2Fboeing-starts-testing-new-jumbo-jet-777x" target="_blank" rel="noopener" style="text-decoration: none;" class="">
<img alt="" style="display: inline-block; width: 25px" width="25" src="https://media.sailthru.com/5z8/1k4/4/2/5e865734bf6f7.jpg">
</a><span>  </span>
<a href="https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=Can+Boeing%27s+new+jet+also+lift+the+company%27s+fortunes%3F+&url=https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/01/26/boeing-starts-testing-new-jumbo-jet-777x&via=MorningBrew" target="_blank" rel="noopener" style="text-decoration: none;" class="">
<img alt="" style="display: inline-block; width: 25px" width="25" src="https://media.sailthru.com/5z8/1k4/4/2/5e86574d1eb82.jpg">
</a><span>  </span>

<img alt="" style="display: inline-block; width: 25px" width="25" src="https://media.sailthru.com/5z8/1k4/4/2/5e86576e04837.jpg">
</a><span>  </span>

<img alt="" style="display: inline-block; width: 25px" width="25" src="https://media.sailthru.com/5z8/1k4/4/2/5e8657887c532.jpg">
</a>
</td>
</tr>
</table>

</td>
</tr>
</table>
</th>

</table>

<div class="c6 " style="margin-bottom:7px">
<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
TRADE
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/01/26/trump-pushes-trade-deal-eu?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Next Stop on the Trade Deal World Tour? Europe
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="President Donald J. Trump meets with the President of the European Commission Ursula von der Leyen during the 50th Annual World Economic Forum meeting Tuesday, Jan. 21, 2020, at the Davos Congress Centre in Davos, Switzerland. " style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiIxNTgwMDcxMTE5LmpwZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im1vcm5pbmdicmV3LW9zbG8iLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>"<a href="https://www.flickr.com/photos/whitehouse/49419287158/" class="link" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">President Trump at Davos</a>" (<a href="https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/mark/1.0/" class="link" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Public Domain</a>) by <a href="https://www.flickr.com/people/whitehouse/" class="link" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">The White House</a></em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">At Davos last week, President Trump said Europe has “<a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/europe-girds-for-trade-battle-with-u-s-11579724950?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">no choice</a>" but to sign a trade deal otherwise he's slapping up to 25% tariffs on Europe's only export more valuable than ABBA: cars. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Trump met with European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen in Switzerland, and the pair <a href="https://www.cnn.com/2020/01/23/business/trade-deal-eu-us/index.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">said</a> they'd work on a deal that <img src="https://emojipedia-us.s3.dualstack.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/thumbs/240/apple/237/hand-with-index-and-middle-fingers-crossed_1f91e.png" class="img-responsive" width="18" style="width:100% !important;max-width: 18px;" alt=""> could be completed by spring break.  </p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">What needs to be hammered out </h2>
<ol>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">Food safety:</strong></span><span> The U.S. isn't happy the EU won't import its hormone-treated beef and "chlorinated" chicken. EU officials are </span><span><a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2020-01-26/eu-turns-to-shellfish-from-soybeans-in-bid-for-trump-trade-deal?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">looking for</a></span><span> a way to import more American shellfish as a compromise, Bloomberg reports.</span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">Taxes:</strong></span><span><span> Several EU countries are </span></span><span><a href="https://www.ft.com/content/f7ee830c-3ee6-11ea-a01a-bae547046735?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">weighing</a></span><span><span> digital services taxes and carbon taxes that would impact U.S. firms. Last week, France agreed to pause its digital tax as it works with the U.S. to avert a tariff showdown. </span></span><span>
</span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">Brexit:</strong></span><span><span> Trump could prioritize talks with the soon-to-be-Brexiting U.K., but those tough EU food safety standards and access to the National Health Service could </span></span><span><a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2020/01/25/us-uk-deal-a-priority-for-trump-but-food-and-health-concerns-remain.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">complicate</a></span><span><span> negotiations. Plus, the U.K. is </span></span><span><em>also</em></span><span><span> negotiating trade terms with the EU. </span></span><span>
</span>
</li>
</ol>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Bottom line: </strong>Trump wants another trade deal to parade around the campaign trail.</p>

<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
ENTERTAINMENT
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/01/26/new-youtube-sundance-documentaries-show-growing-appetite-nonfiction?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Documentaries Got That Yummy Yum
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<!--[if mso]>
<img alt="A gif of Justin Bieber from his "Yummy" music video" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" height=377 src="https://media.giphy.com/media/RitWjMetRnEb84LCJB/giphy.gif">
<![endif]-->
<!--[if !mso]>--><!-- -->
<img class="story-header-image" alt='A gif of Justin Bieber from his "Yummy" music video' style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" src="https://media.giphy.com/media/RitWjMetRnEb84LCJB/giphy.gif">
<!--<![endif]-->
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Giphy</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">We are living in a golden age of documentaries.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Exhibit A: </strong>Justin Bieber's docuseries <em>Seasons </em><a href="https://variety.com/2019/music/news/justin-bieber-youtube-documentary-series-deal-1203454484/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">premieres today</a> on YouTube. Costing over $2 million an episode (there are 10 total), <em>Seasons </em>is YouTube Original Content's most expensive acquisition ever, Variety reports.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>It's a </span><span><a href="https://www.hollywoodreporter.com/live-feed/justin-bieber-docuseries-lands-at-youtube-1265239?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">homecoming</a></span><span> for Bieber, who was discovered on YouTube more than a decade ago.</span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>He has the most YouTube subscribers of any artist (over 49 million). </span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Exhibit B: </strong>The Sundance Film Festival is bursting at the seams with documentaries, even more so than usual. The name to know is <a href="https://www.nytimes.com/2020/01/20/business/media/sundance-festival-concordia.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Concordia Studio</a>, a production company cofounded by Oscar winner Davis Guggenheim and billionaire philanthropist Laurene Powell Jobs. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">What's going on? </strong>People are <a href="https://www.indiewire.com/2020/01/sundance-documentaries-docuseries-sales-titles-acquisitions-1202204951/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">digging</a> high-quality, nonfiction content and streaming companies are paying record amounts to buy those projects. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">The docs to watch: </strong>Chances are you've been invited to a watch party for the Taylor Swift documentary <em>Miss Americana</em>, which debuted at Sundance and comes to Netflix this Friday. We're also looking forward to <a href="https://www.washingtonpost.com/business/2020/01/23/jamal-khashoggi-documentary-dissident/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333"><em>The Dissident</em></a>, a film about the murder of journalist Jamal Khashoggi.</p>

<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Remember Brexit? It's happening this week. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Monday: </strong>New home sales; <span>International </span>Holocaust Remembrance Day</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Tuesday: </strong>Earnings (Apple, Pfizer, Visa, United Technologies, Starbucks, eBay, LVMH)</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Wednesday: </strong>Fed announces interest rate decision; President Trump expected to sign U.S.-Mexico-Canada Agreement; earnings (Boeing, Microsoft, Facebook, AT&T, General Electric, McDonald's, Tesla, PayPal, Novartis)</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Thursday: </strong>Earnings (Amazon, Coca-Cola, Raytheon, Electronic Arts, Verizon, Unilever, UPS, Blackstone, Northrop Grumman, Nintendo, Sprint, U.S. Steel)</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Friday: </strong>The Chicago Purchasing Managers' Index; the U.K. will leave the EU; earnings (Caterpillar, Exxon Mobil, Chevron, Phillips 66)</p>

<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">

<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
WHAT ELSE IS BREWING
</h3>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><a href="https://variety.com/2020/music/news/2020-grammys-winners-list-1203480813/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">All the winners</a></span><span> from last night's Grammy Awards. </span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><a href="https://www.cnn.com/2020/01/22/business/fedex-ground-delivery/index.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">FedEx</a></span><span> started its Sunday ground delivery service this weekend as it tries to fend off Amazon. </span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/state-attorneys-general-to-meet-with-justice-officials-to-coordinate-on-google-probe-11580050801?mod=hp_lead_pos3&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">State attorneys general</a></span><span> are meeting with DOJ lawyers this week for a show and tell of their investigations into Google, the WSJ reports.</span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><a href="https://www.theverge.com/2020/1/24/21081002/byte-vine-successor-available-now-launch-dom-hofmann-ios-android?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Vine</a></span><span> co-creator Dom Hofmann released a competitor to TikTok called Byte. </span>
</li>

670px;\" width=\"670\" class=\"story-header-image\" Images\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/small\u003e\n\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eBasketball icon Kobe Bryant, 41, was \u003ca href=\"https://www.espn.com/nba/story/_/id/28569438/kobe-bryant-dead-helicopter-crash?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ekilled\u003c/a\u003e in a helicopter crash in Calabasas, CA, yesterday. His daughter Gianna also died, along with seven others.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eFor Kobe, business was basketball and basketball was business\u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eWhen he went pro straight out of high school in 1996, Kobe became the youngest player in NBA history. By the time he closed out his career 20 years later, Black Mamba had won five NBA titles, two Olympic gold medals, and an MVP award. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eKobe carried that determination over to the business world, where he was a tenacious investor and entrepreneur.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eESPN anchor Rece Davis \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://twitter.com/ReceDavis/status/1221528592347271176?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003esaid\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e Kobe told him he didn’t miss playing because he attacked his business ventures with the “same ferocity with which he attacked basketball.” \u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eIn a 2017 podcast episode, investor Chris Sacca said he was skeptical about Kobe’s business instincts. A few months after their initial meeting, Sacca \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/chris-sacca-kobe-bryant-investing-2017-7?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ebecame\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e “enthralled by him because this is a very unique personality type that I only kind of see in some of our very best entrepreneurs.”\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eTake his work with sports drink startup BodyArmour. In March 2014, Kobe bought roughly 10% of the company for $6 million. When Coca-Cola acquired a minority stake in BodyArmour in August 2018, Kobe’s investment was reportedly \u003ca href=\"https://www.espn.com/nba/story/_/id/24384862/kobe-bryant-6m-investment-sports-drink-now-worth-200m?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003evalued at $200 million\u003c/a\u003e. Not one to just write a check and watch from the sidelines, Kobe \u003ca href=\"https://ftw.usatoday.com/2018/04/kobe-bryant-bodyarmor-kristaps-harden-mike-trout?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ewrote and co-directed\u003c/a\u003e four of the brand’s ads. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eWhat was Kobe working on recently? \u003c/strong\u003eBryant Stibel, a $100 million venture capital fund he quietly founded with entrepreneur Jeff Stibel in 2013. \u003ca href=\"https://www.bryantstibel.com/about/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eBryant Stibel\u003c/a\u003e has invested in dozens of companies, including LegalZoom and \u003cem\u003eFortnite \u003c/em\u003ecreator Epic Games.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eBottom line: \u003c/strong\u003e“It's a hard thing for athletes to start over. You have to begin again,” Kobe said two years ago. He made it look easy.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e+ \u003ca href=\"https://www.foxsports.com/nba/story/kobe-bryant-death-reaction-news-breaking-helicopter-crash-012620?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eHow the world reacted\u003c/a\u003e to Kobe’s tragic death.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS --\u003e\n\u003ctable style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003ePrepare to get sent home immediately if you arrive at work coughing this week. As of last night, the coronavirus outbreak had killed around 80 people and infected more than 2,100 others, including five in the U.S. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eThe diagnosis: \u003c/strong\u003eChina's top health minister \u003ca href=\"https://www.nbcnews.com/news/world/deadly-coronavirus-likely-spread-china-warns-u-s-prepares-evacuate-n1123211?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003esaid\u003c/a\u003e the virus is spreading more quickly than expected. The government has locked down 56 million citizens and extended the Lunar New Year holiday. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eBut some experts Boeing's newest plane model, the 777X, \u003ca href=\"https://www.reuters.com/article/us-boeing-777x/boeings-777x-jetliner-successfully-completes-maiden-flight-idUSKBN1ZO0QA?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003esuccessfully completed\u003c/a\u003e its maiden voyage on Saturday. It lifted off at 10:09am PT, hung out in the air long enough for pilots to qualify for pretzels (about four hours), and touched down to a big sigh of relief from Boeing execs. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eZoom out: \u003c/strong\u003eBoeing is hoping the 777X (or 777-9, officially) will help it move past the ongoing crisis around the 737 Max, the company's bestselling model that's been grounded for almost a year. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eIf Boeing \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cem\u003ereally\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e wanted to make the 737 Max go away, it could just stick the plane in one of the 777X's massive General Electric engines, which can swallow a 737 Max fuselage whole.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eOne other quirk of the 777X is its folding wingtips that allow it to fit into the same parking bays as its predecessors. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eLooking ahead...\u003c/strong\u003ethe 777X is expected to enter service in 2021. But concerns linger over its \u003ca href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2020-01-24/boeing-777x-first-flight?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eenormous size\u003c/a\u003e (will the economics work out?) and the FAA certification process.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS --\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding-top: 12px;\"\u003e\n\u003ca href=\"https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.morningbrew.com%2Fdaily%2Fstories%2F2020%2F01%2F26%2Fboeing-starts-testing-new-jumbo-jet-777x\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"text-decoration: none;\" class=\"\"\u003e\n\u003cimg alt=\"\" style=\"display: inline-block; EU officials are \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2020-01-26/eu-turns-to-shellfish-from-soybeans-in-bid-for-trump-trade-deal?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003elooking for\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e a way to import more American shellfish as a compromise, Bloomberg reports.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\n\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eTaxes:\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cspan\u003e Several EU countries are \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.ft.com/content/f7ee830c-3ee6-11ea-a01a-bae547046735?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eweighing\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cspan\u003e digital services taxes and carbon taxes that would impact U.S. firms. Last week, France agreed to pause its digital tax as it works with the U.S. to avert a tariff showdown. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\n\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\n\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eBrexit:\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cspan\u003e Trump could prioritize talks with the soon-to-be-Brexiting U.K., but those tough EU food safety standards and access to the National Health Service could \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2020/01/25/us-uk-deal-a-priority-for-trump-but-food-and-health-concerns-remain.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ecomplicate\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cspan\u003e negotiations.
